specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter increased.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When an employee whose Temperance was lower than Level 4 started work, the Agent was turned into a flower.

$0 periodically sends out Scouts to find Oberon. When an Agent died to the Scouts, $0's Qliphoth Counter decreased by 2. Said Agent's corpse then became a flower, which in turn birthed more Scouts(Agents who died to Scouts did not trigger a log.) $0 did not send out Scouts for 40 seconds after a completed Work session.
A strong RED or WHITE damage blow knocked the fairies off of Agent Alto, which then returned to their Containment Cell.
Agents under Rank 3 were turned into a massive flower when damaged by $0.
When $0 came across another Abnormality, they deemed it as 'Oberon', and assimiliated. When the assimiliated creature was suppressed, $0 returned to its Containment Cell.
